# oriented(_:)

**Instance Method**

Transforms the original image by a given orientation.

## Declaration

```swift
func oriented(_ orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation) -> CIImage
```

## Discussion

Returns a new image representing the original image transformed for the given [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ImageIO/CGImagePropertyOrientation].

## Working with Orientation

- **orientationTransform(for:)**: The affine transform for changing the image to the given orientation.
